Title: Establishes a special fee on firearms, rifles and shotguns
Summary: Establishes a special fee on firearms, rifles and shotguns; establishes the gun violence research fund.
LawCode: Add Art 28-D ยง1190, Tax L; add ยง86, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a special fee on firearms, rifles and shotguns; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the gun violence research fund
